name: adnexal lesion with high diastolic flow
description: A lesion in the adnexal region exhibiting high diastolic blood flow on Doppler ultrasound.
synonyms: ovarian lesion with high diastolic flow

name: asymmetrical cystic mass in fetal brain
description: A cystic structure in the fetal brain that is not symmetrical relative to midline structures.

name: calcifications in female genital tract
description: Presence of calcified structures within the female genital organs.

name: cervical mass
description: A solid or cystic lesion located in the cervical region of the uterus.

name: complex cystic adnexal mass
description: A mixed solid and cystic mass in the adnexal region, suggesting potential complications or pathologies.

name: complex pelvic mass
description: A heterogeneous lesion in the pelvic area exhibiting both solid and cystic components.

name: cystic adnexal mass
description: A fluid-filled structure in the adnexal region.

name: cystic fetal abdominal mass
description: A fluid-filled structure identified within the fetal abdomen.

name: cystic fetal mid-abdominal mass
description: A centrally located cystic formation within the fetal abdomen.

name: cystic fetal pelvic mass
description: A cystic formation in the pelvic region of a fetus.

name: cystic fetal upper abdominal mass
description: A cystic structure located in the upper portion of the fetal abdomen.

name: cystic pelvic mass
description: A fluid-filled structure within the pelvis.

name: diffusely enlarged uterus
description: Uniform enlargement of the uterus.

name: early intrauterine pregnancy
description: Early gestation within the uterine cavity.

name: echogenic fetal bowel
description: Increased echogenicity of fetal bowel similar to bone in ultrasound imaging.

name: endometrial fluid
description: Fluid accumulation within the endometrium.

name: endometrial fluid and positive beta-hCG
description: Presence of fluid in the endometrium with a positive pregnancy test.

name: endometrial thickening
description: Increased thickness of the endometrial lining.

name: failure of fetal head to engage during labor
description: The fetal head has not descended into the maternal pelvis during labor.

name: fallopian tube calcification
description: Calcified deposits within a fallopian tube.

name: fallopian tube mass
description: A localized swelling or lump found in the fallopian tube.

name: fetal anterior abdominal wall defect
description: A defect in the anterior abdominal wall of the fetus, allowing internal organs to protrude outside.

name: fetal ascites
description: Accumulation of fluid in the fetal abdomen.

name: fetal cardiac mass
description: An abnormal growth found in the heart of a fetus.

name: fetal chest mass
description: A mass located within the thoracic cavity of the fetus.

name: fetal cranial deformity
description: An abnormal shape or size of the fetal head.

name: fetal hepatosplenomegaly
description: Enlargement of the liver and spleen in a fetus.

name: fetal intra-abdominal calcification
description: Presence of calcified lesions within the fetal abdomen.

name: fetal intracranial calcification
description: Calcification occurring within the fetal brain.

name: fetal neck mass
description: A mass located in the neck region of the fetus.

name: fetal skin thickening
description: Increased thickness of the fetal skin.

name: fetal ventriculomegaly
description: Enlargement of the fetal cerebral ventricles.

name: free fluid in cul-de-sac
description: Presence of fluid in the rectouterine pouch or pouch of Douglas.

name: gastroschisis
description: A defect in the abdominal wall of a fetus, leading to bowel protrusion.

name: hydrops fetalis
description: A severe, life-threatening condition of abnormal fluid accumulation in two or more fetal compartments.

name: hyperechoic focal uterine lesion
description: A bright lesion in the uterus on ultrasound, indicating potential solid or calcified content.

name: hypoechoic placental lesion
description: A darker area within the placenta on ultrasound images, possibly indicating fluid or different tissue density.

name: indefinite uterus sign
description: A sonographic sign indicating an unclear distinction of uterine borders potentially due to adjacent pathology or poor visibility.

name: intrauterine growth retardation
description: Poor growth of a fetus while in the mother's womb during pregnancy.

name: large fetal abdomen during third trimester
description: Abnormally large abdominal measurements in a fetus during the final trimester of pregnancy.

name: large fetal intracranial fluid collection
description: Abnormally large collection of fluid within the fetal brain, potentially indicating an abnormality.

name: large fetus for dates
description: Fetus larger than expected for gestational age, which may indicate gestational diabetes or other conditions.

name: large pelvic soft-tissue mass
description: A significant mass of soft tissue located in the pelvic region, which could be benign or malignant.

name: midline cystic mass in fetal brain
description: Fluid-filled mass located at the midline of the fetal brain.

name: nonvisualization of fetal stomach
description: Inability to see the fetal stomach on ultrasound, which may suggest esophageal atresia or other conditions.

name: omphalocele
description: Congenital anomaly where the intestines or other abdominal organs protrude outside the body at the umbilicus.

name: ovarian cyst
description: Fluid-filled sac within or on the surface of an ovary.

name: ovarian mass in pregnancy
description: Presence of a mass within the ovary of a pregnant woman.

name: ovarian neoplasm or cyst in a child
description: Ovarian lesion in a child, which could be a neoplasm (tumor) or cyst.

name: ovarian tumor
description: Abnormal growth of tissue within the ovary that may be benign or malignant.

name: polyhydramnios
description: Excessive amniotic fluid surrounding the fetus, often associated with maternal or fetal complications.

name: prominence of central uterine echo
description: Unusual appearance of the central uterine echo on ultrasound, which may suggest adenomyosis or other conditions.

name: retroplacental mass
description: An abnormal mass located behind the placenta, which might indicate a placental abruption or other issue.

name: small fetus for dates
description: Fetus smaller than expected for gestational age, which may indicate intrauterine growth restriction.

name: solid ovarian tumor
description: Non-cystic mass in the ovary, could be benign or malignant.

name: solid pelvic mass
description: Hard mass within the pelvic area, potentially indicative of a neoplastic process.

name: solid placental mass
description: Unusual solid mass located within the placenta.

name: straight fetal spine
description: Lack of normal curvature of the fetal spine observed on ultrasound.

name: T1-hyperintense adnexal mass
description: Mass near the uterus that shows high intensity on T1-weighted MR images.

name: T1-hyperintense endometrial uterine mass
description: Mass in the endometrial cavity exhibiting high signal on T1-weighted MRI.

name: T1-hyperintense myometrial uterine mass
description: A mass in the uterine myometrium exhibiting high signal intensity on T1-weighted MRI.

name: T2-hyperintense adnexal mass
description: A mass near the uterus with high signal intensity on T2-weighted MRI.

name: T2-hyperintense endometrial uterine mass
description: A mass in the uterine endometrium exhibiting high intensity on T2-weighted MRI.

name: T2-hyperintense myometrial uterine mass
description: A uterine myometrium mass with high signal intensity on T2-weighted MRI.

name: T2-hypointense adnexal mass
description: A mass adjacent to the uterus with low signal intensity on T2-weighted MRI.

name: T2-hypointense endometrial uterine mass
description: A mass in the uterine endometrium with low intensity on T2-weighted MRI.

name: T2-hypointense myometrial uterine mass
description: A mass in the uterine myometrium exhibiting low signal intensity on T2-weighted MRI.

name: T2-intermediate endometrial uterine mass
description: A uterine endometrial mass with intermediate signal intensity on T2-weighted MRI.

name: T2-intermediate myometrial uterine mass
description: A uterine myometrium mass showing intermediate signal intensity on T2-weighted MRI.

name: thickened placenta
description: An abnormally thick placenta observed in imaging studies.

name: thin placenta
description: An abnormally thin placenta detected in imaging.

name: umbilical cord enlargement
description: Enlargement of the umbilical cord visible in medical imaging.
